component.notes: ====================== Change Log ================== Version: 2.05 Change: Removed RS232 port pending Version: 2.04 Change: Fixed typo in Output 4 Implementations Version: 2.03 Change: Reduced PowerOn and PowerOff delays. Version: 2.02 Change: Added logical components for outputs 2-8 Version: 2.01 Change: Changed port numbering in implementation action_to_select arguments - zero counted (0-7, not 1-8) Version: 2.00 Change: Profile created.
